english.segment1: Chorus. Here we go like (whoop whoop). Break it down like (whoop whoop). Now everybody like (whoop whoop). Come on y'all like (whoop whoop). Here we go like (whoop whoop). Break it down like (whoop whoop). Now everybody like (whoop whoop). Come on y'all like (whoop whoop)
english.segment2: Oh no he's back again. doncha know here I go and I'm rappin in. in the studio in the lab again. the one mic one flow one pad and pen. fo' one mo' just stack em in. one show let's roll let's pack em in. yeah y'all know when we comin in. we blow every mind when we telling it. and we chose every rhyme that we send in this. so folks recognize that we born again. and realize he died so you can live again. it'll crack the skies and then come again. alright lets ride start bouncin in. we can go all night it don't have to end. now it ain't tired we just started man. so get up high holler back if ya hear me yeah come on
english.segment4: Now everybody from front to back. if ya just can't get enough of that. and ya feel the bump and your lovin that. to get em up turn it up and just bump the track cause. that's the way that we runnin that. and all day every day we gotta come with that. all truth no lies it's none of that. Just for you every time just turn and ask. so understand that's why when we bust the track. every time any line any kind of rap. from a kind of guy to a type of cat. you gonna find every rhyme on compact. that is just Christ nothing less than that. and just every time I be runnin that. so that's why I'm always bumpin that. so get a fist real high and start pumpin that come on
